unity holds all the variety it is too

hence we should not expect to know the
full self except progressive
it is not a mere unity on the subjective

observed unity the self is both the
subject that contemplates and the
objective mood thought feeling or action
contemplated what you are and deepest
thought is the unity of those modes and

yourself therefore as merely the
observer you are all these high desires
and aspirations the self that is just
now acting is your soul in part the
deeper self which attains the
receptivity of which you are now
conscious and capable as a function of
your soul living on continuously even
while you are sleep at night do not then
expect any miraculous intuition to tell

that you think and will and act
if you cannot now realize yourself fully
when you will be to be Noble and true
and great it is only because the time
has not yet come there is not yet the
proper correspondence between inner and
outer the soul and its environment
you must await the occasion most of the
problems in our psychological life are

not separated in actual experience look
within and if you look truly you will
note that every moment your mental life

of an interchangeable whole now you are
more conscious of yourself as desiring

measure of being active
you cannot think without willing that is
paying attention when you attend your
act and when you act you think you seem
to be mentally disjointed only because
the apex of consciousness is so small
that you cannot pay attention to your
